languages.text: {n}Техножрец чеканит в ответ:{/n} "Нестерпим лишь позор неисполнения долга. Все прочее — духовный износ".
{n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."
languages.original_text: {n}Техножрец чеканит в ответ:{/n} "Нестерпим лишь позор неисполнения долга. Все прочее — духовный износ".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."
{n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."
{n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."
{n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."
{n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal verkündet ausdruckslos:{/n} "Die einzige unerträgliche Demütigung ist die Nichterfüllung einer Pflicht. Alles andere ist nichts weiter als ein spiritueller Verschleiß."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal verkündet ausdruckslos:{/n} "Die einzige unerträgliche Demütigung ist die Nichterfüllung einer Pflicht. Alles andere ist nichts weiter, als ein spiritueller Verschleiß."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal répond sur un ton pince-sans-rire :{/n} « Le seul déshonneur insupportable est celui du devoir inaccompli. Le reste n'est qu'attrition spirituelle. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal répond sur un ton pince-sans-rire :{/n} « Le seul déshonneur insupportable est celui du devoir inaccompli. Le reste n'est qu'attrition spirituelle. »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡面无表情地开了口。{/n}“只有未能履行职责才是唯一无法容忍的耻辱，其余的仅仅是精神的损耗而已。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡面无表情地开了口。{/n}“只有未能履行职责才是唯一无法容忍的耻辱，其余的仅仅是精神的损耗而已。”

languages.text: {n}パスカルは無表情で言う。{/n}「聖務成就の誓いを果たせないこと以外に耐え難い不名誉などない。それ以外は単に精神が少しすり減るくらいのことでしかない」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは無表情で言う。{/n}「聖務成就の誓いを果たせないこと以外に耐え難い不名誉などない。それ以外は単に精神が少しすり減るくらいのことでしかない」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal dice de manera inexpresiva:{/n} «La única desgracia insoportable es la de un deber incumplido. El resto es mero desgaste espiritual».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal dice de manera inexpresiva:{/n} «La única desgracia insoportable es la de un deber incumplido. El resto es mero desgaste espiritual».

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, tüm ciddiyetiyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Şerefim asıl, vazifemi yerine getiremezsem lekelenir. Gerisi sadece ruhumu yıpratır."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal deadpans,{/n} "The only unbearable disgrace is that of a duty unfulfilled. The rest is merely spiritual attrition."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, tüm ciddiyetiyle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Dayanamayacağım tek kepazelik, vazifemi yerine getirememektir. Gerisi sadece ruhumu yıpratır."
